pyuncertainnumber.pba.intervals.plotting
========================================

.. py:module:: pyuncertainnumber.pba.intervals.plotting


Functions
---------

.. autoapisummary::

   pyuncertainnumber.pba.intervals.plotting.plot_intervals
   pyuncertainnumber.pba.intervals.plotting.plot_lower_bound


Module Contents
---------------

.. py:function:: plot_intervals(x, y_i, **kwargs)

   plot intervals vertically

   :param x: array-like precise values
             x-axis coordinates
   :param y_i: array-like Interval objects
               array of intervals


.. py:function:: plot_lower_bound(x, y_i, **kwargs)

   plot lower bound of intervals

   :param x: array-like
             x-axis coordinates
   :param y_i: array-like
               array of intervals
